thread.title: Patriots’ Martellus Bennett Says He Will Not Go To The White House To See Donald Trump After Super Bowl Win
thread.title_full: Patriots’ Martellus Bennett Says He Will Not Go To The White House To See Donald Trump After Super Bowl Win

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Patriots’ Martellus Bennett Says He Will Not Go To The White House To See Donald Trump After Super Bowl Win
text:
Martellus Bennett made it known that he will not visit the White House later this year because of Donald Trump. 
Will Patriots TE Martellus Bennett make trip to White House if team goes to honor Super Bowl win? "I'm not going to go."
— Brandon George (@DMN_George) February 6, 2017 
Patriots TE Martellus Bennett said he will not go to the White House to honor Super Bowl win. Not worried about what his owner thinks.
— Brandon George (@DMN_George) February 6, 2017 

Bennett has been vocal about his displeasure about Trump’s recent actions so this is not at all surprising.
